message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item at a competitive price. My initial offer is $1,400,000.
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but the price is a bit high for me. I'm prepared to offer $1,000,000.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was hoping we could meet in the middle. My revised offer is $1,200,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to you.
